Skills

Project description

  • Temperature Alert System: Developed a comprehensive temperature control system using 8051 Microcontroller and Assembly language.
  • 4 Bit Counter Implementation: Implemented a 4-bit counter on the FPGA Zybo Z710 board using Verilog.
  • Water Level Monitoring System: Developed a water level monitoring system for overhead tanks with IoT integration.
